```{r}
library(rgdal)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)

shp <- readOGR(
  dsn = paste0(getwd(), "/data"), 
  verbose = FALSE,
  layer = "Zipcode_boundary_scag_2009"
)

shp_df <- tidy(shp, region = "KEY_")
cnames <- aggregate(cbind(long, lat) ~ id, data = shp_df, FUN = mean)

ggplot() +
  geom_polygon(
    data = shp, 
    aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), 
    color = "black", 
    fill = NA
  ) +
  geom_text(data = cnames, aes(x = long, y = lat, label = id), size = 3) +
  theme_void()
```
